mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM xunjianpoint t JOIN ( SELECT IMEI, MAX(Time) AS max_time FROM xunjianpoint GROUP BY IMEI ) m ON t.IMEI = m.IMEI AND t.Time = m.max_time;
SELECT ID, IMEI, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(Time) * 1000 AS time, lng, lat FROM xunjianpoint WHERE IMEI = #{IMEI} AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(Time) * 1000 BETWEEN #{startTimeStamp} AND #{endTimeStamp}
